Description: Al Ahsa Development Co (known as: ADC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 1993. ADC operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Industrial Conglomerates. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. ADC is based in Al Ahsaa, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1993.
